Title: Necessary Roughness
Actors: Scott Cohen, Callie Thorne, Mehcad Brooks, Marc Blucas
Plot: A Long Island psychotherapist's personal life unravels when she finds her husband cheating. Diving fully into her work, Dr. Dani Santino soon finds herself as the most sought-after ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
